task_description: Build Equipment Tracking Table - Sortable table with badges (Ref: 16-equipment-list.png)

patterns.table_pattern: DataTable component at frontend/src/components/ui/DataTable.tsx provides reusable table with sorting, pagination, loading states, and column configuration via Column<T> interface
patterns.badge_pattern: StatusBadge uses MUI Chip with color mapping: draft=default, submitted=info, under_review=warning, approved=success, rejected=error
patterns.api_pattern: API client at frontend/src/api/client.ts uses axios with baseURL from VITE_API_URL, auto-adds auth token and Accept-Language headers
patterns.equipment_api: equipmentApi.list(projectId) fetches equipment array from /projects/{projectId}/equipment endpoint
patterns.styling: Emotion CSS-in-JS with MUI styled() for custom component styling
patterns.page_pattern: Pages use PageHeader component for breadcrumbs, SearchField for search, Tabs for filtering, Card wrapper for content

existing_implementations.description: Existing EquipmentPage.tsx already uses DataTable with equipment display, but this task creates a new simplified table view per design mockup 16-equipment-list.png
relevant_files: frontend/src/pages/EquipmentPage.tsx - Full equipment page with CRUD operations
